basics.name: Nahuel Gorosito
basics.label: Fullstack Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Nahuel is an Argentinian-born, New York City-raised former actor turned software engineer.
 Nahuel's creative side still gets to roam freely as a developer, while also providing an outlet for his analytical side which loves puzzles and algorithms.
 He began dabbling in code via some online tutorials back in 2016, taking the full leap in 2020 by completing App Academy's 16 week, equal parts intense and rewarding bootcamp

work.name: Pied Piper
work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scoresâ„¢ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Victor Alarcon
references.reference: Nahuel has a remarkable ability to quickly pickup and stay up-to-date with different technologies related to software development. This flexibility allows him to jump on different projects regardless of the programming language, framework or platform. Aside from being a talented developer with a keen eye for design he is also responsible, dedicated and someone you can count on. Nahuel and I have had several successful projects together which is why I strongly recommend him as he is an excellent addition to your team!

references.name: Douglas Crawford
references.reference: Nahuel is an industrious and creative software engineer that I have collaborated with on several full-stack web application projects. As Front End Lead for one such project, VitalDB, Nahuel produced quality web pages exhibiting both pixel perfection and intuitive design. Furthermore, Nahuel contributed the project's title and custom-designed logo. My key takeaway from working with Nahuel is that he is receptive, reliable and amiable. His amicability makes him a prime choice for team ventures, and his outstanding diligence allows him to produce innovative and detail-oriented results. As a passionate software engineer, he is constantly learning new technologies and hungry for unique challenges. Nahuel is imaginative and pleasant to work with, and I highly recommend him for any project requiring a dependable teammate and gratifying results.

references.name: Isaac Owens
references.reference: Nahuel is a fantastic software engineer and problem solver. I partnered with Nahuel on a multi day project while we were students together at App Academy and he was definitely one of my favorite partners! He was always so present with the work and was always willing to share and listen to ideas. So many of our bugs were solved with a combination of Nahuel's creative, out of the box thinking and his relentless tenacity. I like that he is always willing to do what it takes to get the job done and it was inspiring to collaborate with someone that goes the extra mile to solve a problem. Throughout our work together I cannot remember a single time Nahuel lost his temper or let his frustration get the best of him! If I were on a team I know that I would feel more comfortable and confident knowing that Nahuel was part of that team as well!

projects.name: Denizen Confidant
projects.description: A full-stack clone of Resident Advisor, the platform to visit for all things Electronic Music
highlights: Concocted robust search functionality for main project entities, initializing query state to  an empty string for main index and triggering a  handler that calls upon custom filter methods on change events and resulting in  a dynamically updated unordered list of matches that renders on each user input.

Enforced user authentication pattern via React conditional front-end routing, using React-Router to configure a Protected Route redirecting the user to login or register page when trying to access unauthorized content (e.g., user profile page, create/update event form).

Designed pixel-perfect renditions of multiple pages, using media queries for scalability, applying box-model and container logic with matching widths and margin-based centering allowing for optimized media-queries dictating key component widths at varying breakpoints
